title: WHA Annual Holiday Party at Wood Ranch/The Grove
desc: It?s the most wonderful time of the year and WHA cordially invites you to celebrate the holiday season with WHA ?A l Fresco? style with wine and hors d?oeuvres at Wood Ranch located in The Grove. It?s a great chance to gather with other WHA members and friends, toast the new year, and even get some of your holiday shopping out of the way, all while taking in the festive splendor of The Grove. And, in the spirit of giving, we will also be collecting donations in the form of toys and books for Venice Family Clinic, a non-profit organization dedicated to providing quality primary health care to people in need.  December 8th, 2015, 6:30 PM??  Wood Ranch at The Grove (189 The Grove Drive Y-80 at Fairfax Avenue/3rd Street in Los Angeles)? Self-parking ? Options?are either $10.00 valet parking at Wood Ranch, or parking in The Grove?s parking structure (1st hour free with validation, and then $4.00 per each additional hour). We look forward to seeing you! RSVP/ORDER TICKETS BY DECEMBER 6, 2015
